text: Pliny is an unincorporated community in Putnam County, West Virginia, United States. It was named for M. Pliny Brown, an early settler. The ZIP code is 25158. Located near Pliny is Maplewood, listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2000. == Notable person == * Virginia Mae Brown, set many "first woman" records ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Putnam County, West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia Category:Charleston, West Virginia metropolitan area Category:Populated places on the Kanawha River
title: Pliny, West Virginia
